timeline.message:
Sort room classes into packages

 - move classes into packages
 - Log -> Timber
 - visibility -> package private

timeline.bodyText: Are relations sufficiently closely related to entities (entity-relational model) that they should be in the entity package?
timeline.author: gino-m

replies.bodyText: I don't have a good answer. There are only a few relations till now but I expect this package to expand with more feature additions. Please suggest what would be better to do here?
replies.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: Ok with leaving it as-is, though will point out that number of instances should only be a rough proxy or a tie-breaker when scoping; i.e., we should seek to group things conceptually rather than by number.
replies.author: gino-m
